mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_operation_time, admin_operation_url, admin_operation_result_code, admin_operation_grade_id, admin_operation_ip from book_store.admin_operation where admin_id = #{adminId}
select admin_id, admin_operation_time, admin_operation_url, admin_operation_result_code, admin_operation_grade_id, admin_operation_ip from book_store.admin_operation limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into book_store.admin_operation(admin_id, admin_operation_time, admin_operation_url, admin_operation_result_code, admin_operation_grade_id, admin_operation_ip) values (#{adminId}, #{adminOperationTime}, #{adminOperationUrl}, #{adminOperationResultCode}, #{adminOperationGradeId}, #{adminOperationIp})
mapper.update:
update book_store.admin_operation
admin_id = #{adminId},
admin_operation_time = #{adminOperationTime},
admin_operation_url = #{adminOperationUrl},
admin_operation_result_code = #{adminOperationResultCode},
admin_operation_grade_id = #{adminOperationGradeId},
admin_operation_ip = #{adminOperationIp},
where = #{}
